data.title: SMK Main Convent, Ipoh
data.meta_description: SMK Convent Ipoh is an all-girls secondary school located on Jalan Sultan Idris Shah, Ipoh, Perak, Malaysia. Established as a Roman Catholic foundation in 1907, it is one of the oldest schools in Ipoh and is widely known as Main Convent Ipoh. Owned by the religious order the Sisters of the Holy Infant Jesus (IJS), SMK Main convent was formally a private missionary school and is one of around twenty convent secondary schools in Malaysia.
